comment.author: 11418107@N02
comment._content: Mrs. Eustis was the former Nina Floyd Crosby; she was widowed when James Biddle Eustis (son of the Ambassador and Senator of the same name) died in 1915; she married again in 1917, to French sportsman Marquis de Polignac. fr.wikipedia.org/wiki/Marie_Charles_Jean_Melchior_de_Poli... Her earlier appearance in the Commons: [http://www.flickr.com/photos/library_of_congress/3576202718/]

comment.author: 70251312@N00
comment._content: Those ridiculous bird wings on her hat suggest that it may be poised to fly away in a strong wind -- and the pipe-smoking young man at right seems to entertain precisely that worry about his own headgear . . . .
